Translations.Text: ‘Arau ma'i tomaka manonita karaicho. Seye yi ahi praerana karaa haya seya manoyoga sahakarae suna
‘Niscaya maye'i allaha, mora bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i. Eteke kerala morae'i ibadata karaa arau mora smaranarthe chalata kayema karaa
‘Niscaya kiyamata arasyambharai, ma'i e'ito gopana raakhiba bicarao yate pratyekake nija nija cesta-sadhana anuyayi pratidana diya yaya
‘Eteke yi byakti kiyamatara prati imana posana nakarae arau nija prabrttira anusarana karae, si yena tomaka iyara prati imana anara paraa birata naraakhe, an'yatha tumi dhbansa hai yaba
‘Arau he mucha! Tomara som hatata se'ito ki’
te'om ka’le, ‘e'idala mora lakhuti, iyara oparata ma'i bhara di'om, arau iyara dbaraa ma'i mora chagaliborara babe gachara pata saraa'om lagate e'idala mora an'yan'ya kamato ahe’
Allahe ka’le, ‘he mucha! Tumi e'idala (matita) niksepa karaacona’
Tara pichata te'om se'idala niksepa karaile, lage lage seya edala sapa hai dauraiba dharaile
allahe ka’le, ‘tumi e'ito dharaa, bhaya nakaraiba, ami iyaka iyara agara arasthata ubhata'i dima
‘Arau tumi tomara hatakhana kasalatita raakha, seya arau eta nidarsanasbaraupa kono dharanara trautibihina ujjbala hai ola'i ahiba
‘E'ito e'i babe ye, ami tomaka amara kichumana mahana nidarsanarali dekhuraama
‘Phira'a'unara ocarata yoraa, niscaya si simalanghana karaiche’
Mucha'i ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Mora buku prasasta karai diya
‘Arau mora kama sahaja karai diya
‘arau mora jibhara jarata dura karai diya
‘yate sihamte mora katha bujiba parae
‘Arau mora paraiyalara paraa mora babe ejana sahayyakarai nirdharana karai diya
‘mora bha'i haraunaka
‘te'omra dbaraa mora sakti sudrrha karaa
‘arau te'omka mora kamata ansidara karaa
‘yate ami tomara bechi bechi tachabiha patha karaiba parao
‘arau adhika paraimane smarana karaiba parao
‘Niscaya tumi amara samyaka drasta’
Te'om ka’le, ‘he mucha! Tumi yi bicaraicha seya tomaka pradana karaa ha’la
‘Arau arasye ami tomara prati arau ebara anugraha karaichilo
